name: Polygon Maniacs
description:
Play Polygon maniacs either on the go or for long hours with its dynamic gameplay. 

----------------

• It is FREE
• Destroy all your enemies by shooting at them, but beware, all bullets, including yours are deadly to you and your enemies
• Enjoy 6 modes of difficulty which in total has 50+ levels
• The fun doesn't stop even after the 6 modes, as there is an endless mode
• At first, you may find it hard, but practice makes perfect! Remember that the enemies bullets can be used against them
• More than 20 enemy types to fight against

----------------

Join me on Discord and share your highscore on endless mode!
https://discord.gg/qHZ54zf

----------------

Most importantly, have fun
